column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Meelo and Ikki says : " Korra ! "
#Text=Ikki says : " Are you coming to live with us on the island ? "
#Text=Korra says : " No , I 'm sorry , Ikki .
#Text=I have done my best to guide Republic City toward the dream my father had for it , but you 're right .
#Text=It has fallen out of balance since he passed .
#Text=I thought I should put off your training in order to uphold his legacy , but you are his legacy .
#Text=You may stay and train airbending here with me .
#Text=Republic City needs its Avatar once again .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes !
#Text=Thank you !
#Text=You 're the best !
#Text=" Meelo , Ikki , and Jinora says : " Yaaaaay !
#Text=" Korra says : " Hello ?
#Text=I 'm Korra , your new Avatar .
#Text=" Male journalist # 1 says : " Does this mean you 've moved to Republic City ?
#Text=" Female journalist says : " Were you trying to send a message to the Triads yesterday ?
#Text=" Male journalist # 2 says : " Will you be fighting crime or the Anti-bending Revolution , or both ?
#Text=" Male journalist # 3 says : " Will you be working with Chief Beifong and the police ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Uh ... yes , I am definitely here to stay , but honestly I - I do n't exactly have a plan yet .
#Text=See , I 'm still in training , but , look , all I know is Avatar Aang meant for this city to be the center of peace and balance in the world , and I believe we can make his dream a reality .
#Text=I look forward to serving you !
#Text="
